articles.title: Buck Moon: July supermoon to appear brighter than usual in the sky this week - BBC
articles.description: July's full Moon, known as a Buck Moon, will be closer than normal in its orbit around the Earth.
articles.content:
The Moon will have us gazing at the sky on Monday evening as it appears brighter and larger than usual.
July's supermoon will appear full for up to three days, according to Nasa.

articles.title: Detection of the cosmological time dilation of high-redshift quasars - Nature.com
articles.description: A Bayesian-based analysis of 190 cosmologically distant quasars, photometrically observed over two decades, has revealed the long-expected presence of cosmic time dilation owing to the expansion of space imprinted on their variability.
